comprehensive_overview: The OpenGL Extension Wrangler Library (GLEW) is a cross-platform open-source C/C++ extension loading library. It assists in accessing OpenGL extensions and functions dynamically, providing a simple and lightweight solution for managing OpenGL extensions.
core_features:
1. Cross-platform support
2. Dynamic loading of OpenGL extensions
3. Lightweight and easy to use
4. Simplifies managing OpenGL extensions
5. Open-source with a permissive license
